title: Geothermal networks let cities warm and cool as one
description: An upgrade to district heating systems brings greater flexibility and efficiency, and is giving gas companies a renewable future.
content:
Troy in New York state is one of the first cities to use an innovative type of heat pump.Credit: TW Farlow/Getty
